name: Stupid Ghosts
description:
A simple shooter 2D made for the Mini Jam 117.

Controls:

WASD or Arrows - Move the Player

Space - Shoot

P - Pause

Credits:

Music from pack Total Music Collection by Muz Station Productions.

SFX from pack Pro Sound Collection by Gamemaster Audio.

Tiles from pack Tiny Dungeon by Kenney.

Font  old-pixel-7 by Sizenko Alexander.

Sprites for UI Panel & Buttons by Henry Software.

Programming by Javier Cantizani.
